attributes.action: promise the British people that Sharia Law will never, ever be made British law in any town or city.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sharia Law is now being requested to be made British law in some towns and city across the country.

The prime minister should make a promise to the British people to ensure that Sharia Law never becomes British law in any town or city.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
